text: You encounter a person spreading harmful stereotypes. They are saying that Israel only wants to go into Gaza for money! What do you do?

choices.text: Explain that this is a stereotype, Israeli's are going into Gaza to protect themselves

text: The next person says that Jews should go back to Europe! What do you do?

choices.text: Explain that Israel is the Jewsih homeland. Jews are indigenous to the land of Israel

text: The next person is shouting with a sign 'Free Free Palestine'! What do you do?

choices.text: Explain that Palestine is not a country. It is called Israel and it is free. People live happily together from all walks of life enjoying all the same opertunities and privliges
